file_setup.TMPCMD: sh -c 'mkdir -m 777 -p /TMPLOGSDIR/; { set -e; ls -l /TMPCODEDIR/*py; mkdir -m 777 -p /TMPDATADIR/; } 2>&1 | tee TMPLOGSDIR/TMPJOB.log; '

setup_check.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ set -e; cd /TMPCODEDIR/; /usr/bin/time -v python3 /TMPCODEDIR/check_utilities.py TMPSRC TMPOPTS; } 2>&1 | tee TMPLOGSDIR/TMPJOB.log; '

setup_fetch.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ set -e; cd /TMPDATADIR/TMPALIASDIR; ls -l file_metadata.json; /usr/bin/time -v python3 /TMPCODEDIR/fetch_utilities.py file_metadata.json TMPOPTS; } 2>&1 | tee TMPLOGSDIR/TMPJOB.log; '

pipeline_check.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ set -e; cd /TMPCODEDIR/; /usr/bin/time -v python3 /TMPCODEDIR/check_utilities.py TMPSRC TMPOPTS; } 2>&1 | tee TMPLOGSDIR/TMPJOB.log; '

pipeline_fetch.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ set -e; cd /TMPDATADIR/TMPALIASDIR; /usr/bin/time -v python3 /TMPCODEDIR/fetch_utilities.py file_metadata.json TMPOPTS; } 2>&1 | tee TMPLOGSDIR/TMPJOB.log; '

pipeline_table.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ set -e; cd /TMPDATADIR/TMPALIASDIR; /usr/bin/time -v python3 /TMPCODEDIR/table_utilities.py TMPCHUNK file_metadata.json TMPOPTS; } 2>&1 | tee TMPLOGSDIR/TMPJOB.log; '

pipeline_conv.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ set -e; /usr/bin/time -v python3 /TMPCODEDIR/conv_utilities.py /TMPDATADIR/TMPEDGEDIR TMPOPTS; } 2>&1 | tee TMPLOGSDIR/TMPJOB.log; '

next_step_caller.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ python3 /TMPCODEDIR/setup_utilities.py TMPNEXTSTEP TMPOPTS -p TMPSTART; } 2>&1 | tee TMPLOGSDIR/TMPJOB.log; '
